05E2766D.AffixDesc_Magic: Monster attacks from a distance reduce dodge chance by 8% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 40%.

65099C16.AffixDesc_Rare: Monster attacks from a distance reduce dodge chance by 10% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 50%.

BA17B427.AffixDesc_Legendary: Monster attacks from a distance reduce dodge chance by 12% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 60%.
